parameters.name: ChildUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used as the member. You must set the RelationId parameter or all of the ParentUserId, ChildUserId, and RelationType parameters.

parameters.name: ParentUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used as the management account. You must set the RelationId parameter or all of the ParentUserId, ChildUserId, and RelationType parameters.

parameters.name: RelationId
parameters.description: The ID of the financial relationship between the management account and the member. You must set the RelationId parameter or all of the ParentUserId, ChildUserId, and RelationType parameters.

parameters.name: RelationType
parameters.description: The type of the financial relationship. Set the value to enterprise_group.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request. The ID is used to mark a request and troubleshoot a problem.
